name: Bloody Pirate 2
description:
Bloody Pirate 2 is an MMORPG game whose plot follows the famous manga of Eiichiro Oda, One Piece.

The world is navigated in real time and through various menus, while battles remain turn-based. Players can assemble a team of their own heroes, which are divided into four different classes, and go on a quest to find the treasure of the pirate king. Among other things, Bloody Pirate 2 has plenty of PvP and PvE events, all sorts of challenges and original music.
